×3"},{"lineNumber":122740,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おや、ランス殿」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, Lord Rance."},{"lineNumber":122741,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、そろそろ魔軍との合戦始まるぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, the battle with the demon army will start soon."},{"lineNumber":122742,"originalJapaneseLine":"　準備は出来てるか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you ready?"},{"lineNumber":122743,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、香様も含め、準備は万全じゃ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, including Lady Kaoru, preparations are perfect."},{"lineNumber":122744,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつでも大丈夫ですぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"We are ready at any time."},{"lineNumber":122745,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm."},{"lineNumber":122746,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　どうされましたかな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"? What is the matter?"},{"lineNumber":122747,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、香ちゃんが戦場に出るのを","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, I'm a bit surprised that you allow Kaoru to go to the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":122748,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前が許すとはな、少しびっくり","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm a little surprised that you permit it."},{"lineNumber":122749,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むう……儂とて出来れば出したくは……","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm... I too would prefer not to send her out if possible..."},{"lineNumber":122750,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃが、この戦いは全人類のもの。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, this battle is for all humanity."},{"lineNumber":122751,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ならば前に出ることも必要になる」","translatedEnglishLine":"Therefore, stepping forward is also necessary."},{"lineNumber":122752,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦争を他人事って考えてる奴も沢山いるけどなぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"There are many who think of war as someone else's problem, though."},{"lineNumber":122753,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だからこそ、香様がまず死力を尽くされる」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's why Lady Kaoru must first exert herself to the utmost."},{"lineNumber":122754,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうでなくば後に続く者がいなくなる」","translatedEnglishLine":"Otherwise, there will be no one to follow her after."},{"lineNumber":122755,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……少なくとも無意識に","translatedEnglishLine":"...At least unconsciously,"},{"lineNumber":122756,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そう考えておられるようじゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"she seems to think that way."},{"lineNumber":122757,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ならば！×３」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then! ×3"},{"lineNumber":122758,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂に出来るのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"What I can do town,"},{"lineNumber":122764,"originalJapaneseLine":"　普通の女の子にすることじゃった」","translatedEnglishLine":"an ordinary girl."},{"lineNumber":122765,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただ、自分の幸福だけを考えていれば良い、","translatedEnglishLine":"Just to be a girl who only needs to think about her own worry about Kaoru."},{"lineNumber":122773,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む？×３」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm? ×3"},{"lineNumber":122774,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この戦争は俺様がすぐ終わらせるからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will end this war I'm sorry."},{"lineNumber":122780,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、ランス殿も香様には","translatedEnglishLine":"No, Lord Rance is also gentle with Lady Kaoru..."},{"lineNumber":122781,"originalJapaneseLine":"　優しくしておられましたな……","translatedEnglishLine":"You've been kind to her, haven't you..."},{"lineNumber":122782,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、その点に関しては、","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, in that regard,"},{"lineNumber":122783,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス殿は信頼が置けると思うておりますぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I believe Lord Rance is trustworthy."},{"lineNumber":122784,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふんっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph..."},{"lineNumber":122785,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、そうだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, that's right."},{"lineNumber":122786,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦争が終わったら香ちゃんを","translatedEnglishLine":"When the war ends, I'll add Kaoru"},{"lineNumber":122787,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様のハーレムに入れてやるのもいいな」","translatedEnglishLine":"to my harem."},{"lineNumber":122788,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これで普通かつ幸福な女の子になれるぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"With this, she can become a normal and happy girl."},{"lineNumber":122789,"originalJapaneseLine":"　信長には墓前に事後報告でよかろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"As for Nobunaga, a posthumous report at his grave will suffice."},{"lineNumber":122790,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がははははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahahahaha!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裸の王となってしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He will become the naked king.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「相手への理解、これが王には必要なのです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Understanding the opponent, this is what a king needs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「特に今は各国の協力こそが何よりも肝要」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially now, cooperation among the countries is more important than anything else.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最初からずっと協力を呼びかけていた香様は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lady Kaoru, who has been calling for cooperation from the beginning,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その辺りをよう分かっておられるわけじゃな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: certainly understands that very well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス殿も香様を見習わねば」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance must also learn from Lady Kaoru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、具体的には……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, specifically...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐうぐう……すぴー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (snore... snore...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「話を聞かんかーっ！×３」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Listen to me! ×3

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おや、ランス殿」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, Lord Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、そろそろ魔軍との合戦始まるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, the battle with the demon army will start soon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 準備は出来てるか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you ready?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、香様も含め、準備は万全じゃ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, including Lady Kaoru, preparations are perfect.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつでも大丈夫ですぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are ready at any time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーむ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「？　どうされましたかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ? What is the matter?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、香ちゃんが戦場に出るのを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I'm a bit surprised that you allow Kaoru to go to the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が許すとはな、少しびっくり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm a little surprised that you permit it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むう……儂とて出来れば出したくは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... I too would prefer not to send her out if possible...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃが、この戦いは全人類のもの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, this battle is for all humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ならば前に出ることも必要になる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, stepping forward is also necessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦争を他人事って考えてる奴も沢山いるけどなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are many who think of war as someone else's problem, though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だからこそ、香様がまず死力を尽くされる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why Lady Kaoru must first exert herself to the utmost.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうでなくば後に続く者がいなくなる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Otherwise, there will be no one to follow her after.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……少なくとも無意識に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...At least unconsciously,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう考えておられるようじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she seems to think that way.
Then! ×3

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂に出来るのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What I can do is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを出来るだけ助けることのみ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to help her do that as much as possible!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほーん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……儂とて、本当は戦わせたくないわい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Even I truly do not want to make her fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「信長様の夢は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Nobunaga's dream was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香様を市井に暮らすような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to have Lady Kaoru live as an ordinary girl in the town,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普通の女の子にすることじゃった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: an ordinary girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただ、自分の幸福だけを考えていれば良い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just to be a girl who only needs to think about her own happiness,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう普通の女の子に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: such an ordinary girl...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「が、今は堪え忍ぶしかあるまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But now, she must endure and persevere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんとも……時代が悪いのかのう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How unfortunate... is it just bad timing?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いや、すみませぬ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, pardon me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愚痴など――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Such complaints—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「香ちゃんのことなら気にするな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't worry about Kaoru.
Hmm? ×3

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この戦争は俺様がすぐ終わらせるからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will end this war quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうしたら香ちゃんも普通の女の子だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Kaoru will be a normal girl,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと偉いだけのな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just a little bit important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あんたもたまには優しいこと言うんじゃのう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...You say something kind once in a while, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様はいつだって優しいわい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm always kind, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、少し意外で……すみませぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, that's a bit unexpected... I'm sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、ランス殿も香様には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, Lord Rance is also gentle with Lady Kaoru...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 優しくしておられましたな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've been kind to her, haven't you...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、その点に関しては、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, in that regard,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス殿は信頼が置けると思うておりますぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I believe Lord Rance is trustworthy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふんっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、そうだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, that's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争が終わったら香ちゃんを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the war ends, I'll add Kaoru

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様のハーレムに入れてやるのもいいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to my harem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これで普通かつ幸福な女の子になれるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With this, she can become a normal and happy girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 信長には墓前に事後報告でよかろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As for Nobunaga, a posthumous report at his grave will suffice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahaha!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裸の王となってしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He will become the naked king.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「相手への理解、これが王には必要なのです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Understanding the opponent, this is what a king needs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「特に今は各国の協力こそが何よりも肝要」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially now, cooperation among the countries is more important than anything else.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最初からずっと協力を呼びかけていた香様は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lady Kaoru, who has been calling for cooperation from the beginning,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その辺りをよう分かっておられるわけじゃな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: certainly understands that very well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス殿も香様を見習わねば」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance must also learn from Lady Kaoru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、具体的には……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, specifically...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐうぐう……すぴー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (snore... snore...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「話を聞かんかーっ！×３」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Listen to me! ×3

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おや、ランス殿」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, Lord Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、そろそろ魔軍との合戦始まるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, the battle with the demon army will start soon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 準備は出来てるか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you ready?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、香様も含め、準備は万全じゃ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, including Lady Kaoru, preparations are perfect.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつでも大丈夫ですぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are ready at any time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーむ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「？　どうされましたかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ? What is the matter?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、香ちゃんが戦場に出るのを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I'm a bit surprised that you allow Kaoru to go to the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が許すとはな、少しびっくり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm a little surprised that you permit it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むう……儂とて出来れば出したくは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... I too would prefer not to send her out if possible...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃが、この戦いは全人類のもの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, this battle is for all humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ならば前に出ることも必要になる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, stepping forward is also necessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦争を他人事って考えてる奴も沢山いるけどなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are many who think of war as someone else's problem, though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だからこそ、香様がまず死力を尽くされる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why Lady Kaoru must first exert herself to the utmost.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうでなくば後に続く者がいなくなる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Otherwise, there will be no one to follow her after.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……少なくとも無意識に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...At least unconsciously,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう考えておられるようじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she seems to think that way.
Then! ×3

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂に出来るのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What I can do is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを出来るだけ助けることのみ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to help her do that as much as possible!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほーん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……儂とて、本当は戦わせたくないわい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Even I truly do not want to make her fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「信長様の夢は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Nobunaga's dream was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香様を市井に暮らすような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to have Lady Kaoru live as an ordinary girl in the town,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普通の女の子にすることじゃった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: an ordinary girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただ、自分の幸福だけを考えていれば良い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just to be a girl who only needs to think about her own happiness,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう普通の女の子に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: such an ordinary girl...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「が、今は堪え忍ぶしかあるまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But now, she must endure and persevere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんとも……時代が悪いのかのう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How unfortunate... is it just bad timing?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いや、すみませぬ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, pardon me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愚痴など――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Such complaints—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「香ちゃんのことなら気にするな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't worry about Kaoru.
Hmm? ×3

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この戦争は俺様がすぐ終わらせるからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will end this war quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうしたら香ちゃんも普通の女の子だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Kaoru will be a normal girl,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと偉いだけのな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just a little bit important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あんたもたまには優しいこと言うんじゃのう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...You say something kind once in a while, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様はいつだって優しいわい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm always kind, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、少し意外で……すみませぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, that's a bit unexpected... I'm sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、ランス殿も香様には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, Lord Rance is also gentle with Lady Kaoru...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 優しくしておられましたな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've been kind to her, haven't you...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、その点に関しては、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, in that regard,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス殿は信頼が置けると思うておりますぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I believe Lord Rance is trustworthy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふんっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、そうだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, that's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争が終わったら香ちゃんを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the war ends, I'll add Kaoru

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様のハーレムに入れてやるのもいいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to my harem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これで普通かつ幸福な女の子になれるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With this, she can become a normal and happy girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 信長には墓前に事後報告でよかろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As for Nobunaga, a posthumous report at his grave will suffice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahaha!
